price: Kisha tukakufufueni baada ya kufa kwenu, ili mpate kushukuru.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: Kisha tukakuzindueni kutokana na huko kudawaa kwenu na kupwelewa, na tukakufundisheni ili mpate kuishukuru neema yetu kwa hayo, na mpate kuiunga mkono Haki ya Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kupitia njia ya shukrani hii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
